MajorClaims.MC1: students can acquire more benefits from the remote education
MajorClaims.MC2: distance-learning outweighs the conventional way not only with its efficiency, convenience and economic value, but also with the self-regulated education that pupils can study on their own purpose

Claims.C1: traditional education has some merits like feedbacks and inspirations that cannot be replaced in the near future
Claims.C2: studying at home save the pupils enormous time and considerable expense
Claims.C3: long-distance education provides students the opportunity to access the immense knowledge resources and a variety of teaching approaches
Claims.C4: traditional education has its advantages in face-to-face communication, mental inspiration and physical educations

Premises.P1: Students who use distance-learning programs can cut down their commuting time, tuition fees, textbook fees and so forth just by an internet connection
Premises.P2: This especially makes a significant difference for the children who live in the far-off countryside and the children whose families are living below the poverty-line
Premises.P3: he can control the learning progress and make satisfactory achievement on this course
Premises.P4: A student can even select a specific online course based on his own preference and time schedule
Premises.P5: Pupils can obtain materials for their curricula just by one mouse click, such as science reports, study posts, documentary records, etc
Premises.P6: These make remarkable contributions in providing immediate feedbacks and cultivating pupils' personalities
Premises.P7: with the improvements in streaming and sensor technologies, remote education can eliminate the obstacles of distance and body contacts
